tag_list: online-quizzes, online-games, games, recipes, recipe-reviews, coupons, discounts, sweepstakes, loyalty-programs, coupon-sites, deals
overview: AmericanFamily.com is a marketing site where registered users are invited to take quizzes, play games, and review recipes. Doing so earns the users points, which can then be spent in the American Family online store. AmericanFamily.com also provides coupons (printable and online), as well as weekly giveaways and the occasional sweepstakes. http://www.americanfamily.com
